events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department for further processing.
A recruiter specializing in software engineering roles has been assigned to manage your application.
We have completed the initial screening of your resume and would like to invite you for a technical interview.
Thank you for considering the offer; I am available for the technical interview on the proposed dates.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 20th at 10 AM with the lead software engineer.
You successfully completed the technical interview; the interviewers were impressed with your coding skills.
The HR interview has been scheduled for May 23rd, please prepare to discuss your career goals and work preferences.
